languages.text: "Это сложно описать, элантах. Но твоя душа сияет достаточно ярко, а разум крепок, чтобы ты смог{mf||ла} погрузиться в свой внутренний мир и очистить его от лишних переживаний. Я все еще не уверена, что твой вид способен на подобное... Но попробовать стоит. Если ничего не получится — ты лишь потратишь крупицу своего времени".

"It is difficult to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to immerse yourself in your own mind and cleanse it of unnecessary cares. I am still not sure that your species is capable of such a thing... But it is worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."
languages.original_text: "Это сложно описать, элантах. Но твоя душа сияет достаточно ярко, а разум крепок, чтобы ты смог{mf||ла} погрузиться в свой внутренний мир и очистить его от лишних переживаний. Я все еще не уверена, что твой вид способен на подобное... Но попробовать стоит. Если ничего не получится — ты лишь потратишь крупицу своего времени".

traits.locale_text: "It's hard to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to dive into your own mind and purify it from the unnecessary worries. I'm still not sure whether your kind is able to do this... But it's worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我很难用语言来说清楚，外界人。不过，你的灵魂熠熠生辉，你的心智也足够强大，或许你可以尝试沉浸在精神世界中，清除不必要的烦恼。我不确定你们人类是否真的能够做到这一点，但这值得一试。就算最终失败了，你所有的损失也不过是一丁点时间罢了。”
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to immerse yourself in your own mind and cleanse it of unnecessary cares. I am still not sure that your species is capable of such a thing... But it is worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."

traits.locale_text: “我很难用语言来说清楚，外界人。不过，你的灵魂熠熠生辉，你的心智也足够强大，或许你可以尝试沉浸在精神世界中，清除不必要的烦恼。我不确定你们人类是否真的能够做到这一点，但这值得一试。就算最终失败了，你所有的损失也不过是一丁点时间罢了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Es difícil de describir, elantach. Pero tu alma brilla con intensidad y tu mente es lo bastante fuerte para que puedas sumergirte en tu propia psique y purgarla de preocupaciones innecesarias. Aún no estoy segura de que tu especie sea capaz de tal cosa... pero merece la pena intentarlo. En el peor de los casos, lo único que perderás será una pequeña fracción de tu tiempo».
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to immerse yourself in your own mind and cleanse it of unnecessary cares. I am still not sure that your species is capable of such a thing... But it is worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est difficile à décrire, elantach, mais votre âme brille vivement et votre esprit est assez fort pour vous permettre de vous y immerger afin de faire disparaître ce qui vous trouble. Je ne suis toutefois pas certaine que votre espèce en soit capable... mais ça vaut la peine d'essayer. Vous n'avez rien à perdre, hormis un peu de votre temps. »
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to immerse yourself in your own mind and cleanse it of unnecessary cares. I am still not sure that your species is capable of such a thing... But it is worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."

traits.locale_text: « C'est difficile à décrire, elantach, mais votre âme brille vivement et votre esprit est assez fort pour vous permettre de vous y immerger afin de faire disparaître ce qui vous trouble. Je ne suis toutefois pas certaine que votre espèce en soit capable... mais ça vaut la peine d'essayer. Vous n'avez rien à perdre, hormis un peu de votre temps. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist schwer zu beschreiben, Elantach. Aber Eure Seele strahlt hell, und Euer Geist ist stark genug, damit Ihr Euch selbst hineinbegeben könnt, um ihn von unnötigem Unrat zu reinigen. Ich bin noch unsicher, ob Eure Spezies dazu überhaupt fähig ist ... aber einen Versuch ist es wert. Wenn nichts dabei herauskommt, habt Ihr nur ein wenig Zeit verloren."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to immerse yourself in your own mind and cleanse it of unnecessary cares. I am still not sure that your species is capable of such a thing... But it is worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."

Aber Eure Seele strahlt hell, und Euer Geist ist stark genug, damit Ihr Euch selbst hineinbegeben könnt, um ihn von unnötigem Unrat zu reinigen. Ich bin noch unsicher, ob Eure Spezies dazu überhaupt fähig ist ... aber einen Versuch ist es wert. Wenn nichts dabei herauskommt, habt Ihr nur ein wenig Zeit verloren."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「表現するのは難しいのだ、エランタ。だが、お前の魂は輝いていて、その心は十分に強い。だから自分の心に没入し、不必要な心配事を一掃することができる。お前の種族にそのようなことができるかどうか、我にはまだ確信が持てない…だが、やってみる価値はある。そこから何も生まれなければ、失うのはほんのわずかな時間だけだ」
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to immerse yourself in your own mind and cleanse it of unnecessary cares. I am still not sure that your species is capable of such a thing... But it is worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."

traits.locale_text: 「表現するのは難しいのだ、エランタ。だが、お前の魂は輝いていて、その心は十分に強い。だから自分の心に没入し、不必要な心配事を一掃することができる。お前の種族にそのようなことができるかどうか、我にはまだ確信が持てない…だが、やってみる価値はある。そこから何も生まれなければ、失うのはほんのわずかな時間だけだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Açıklaması zor elantach. Fakat ruhun pırıl pırıl parlıyor ve zihnin kendine odaklanıp önemsiz şeyleri temizleyebilecek kadar güçlü. Senin türünün bunu yapabildiğinden emin değilim ama denemekten zarar gelmez. Sonuç alamazsak tek kaybedeceğin şey, biraz zaman olur."
languages.original_text: "It is difficult to describe, elantach. But your soul shines bright and your mind is strong enough for you to be able to immerse yourself in your own mind and cleanse it of unnecessary cares. I am still not sure that your species is capable of such a thing... But it is worth a try. If nothing comes out of it, then the only thing you will lose is a small fraction of your time."
